page_settings_modal.auto_orientation_desc: Automatically switch layout based on device orientation.
page_settings_modal.bg_file_input_desc: Select a background image from your computer.
page_settings_modal.bg_fit_desc: Select how the background image should be displayed.
page_settings_modal.bg_input_desc: Enter the URL of the background image.
page_settings_modal.custom_theme_desc: Enter custom CSS to override the default theme.
page_settings_modal.custom_theme_name_desc: Enter a name for your custom theme.
page_settings_modal.font_input_desc: Enter the name of the font you want to use (must be installed on your system).
page_settings_modal.font_select_desc: Choose from a list of common fonts.
page_settings_modal.frosted_glass_bg_only_desc: Apply the frosted glass effect only to the background image.
page_settings_modal.frosted_glass_enabled_desc: Check to enable the frosted glass effect for the main content area.
page_settings_modal.layout_switch_desc: Switch between vertical and horizontal layout.

system_settings_modal.auto_connect_desc: Whether to automatically connect to the server when the page loads.
system_settings_modal.query_parameters_desc: Additional parameters to send to the server during the connection (must be a valid JSON object).
system_settings_modal.reconnect_attempts_desc: The maximum number of times the client will try to reconnect to the server after a disconnection.
system_settings_modal.reconnect_delay_desc: The time (in milliseconds) to wait between each reconnection attempt.
system_settings_modal.server_address_desc: The address of the WebSocket server (e.g., ws://localhost:4000).
system_settings_modal.socketio_path_desc: The path used by Socket.IO on the server (usually '/socket.io').
system_settings_modal.timeout_desc: The maximum time (in milliseconds) the client will wait for a response from the server.
system_settings_modal.transport_desc: The transport protocol to use for the connection (usually 'websocket').
